column6: WAVE OF MUTILATION PART 1 Deadpool has ceased to exist, he's given his good-byes, he's driven his car into the ocean. But he is not dead. No...now, he's a pirate!
column8: | penciller:Shawn Crystal | penciller:Jason Pearson | other:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Lee Loughridge | inker:John Lucas | letterer:Cory Petit | writer:Daniel Way
